Asian Turkey :

),

)
,

)

and as

; 1975),

and as

European Turkey :
Fahringer (1922, as
Monanthia echii
)
,
Hoberlandt (1956, as
M. echii
)
, Lodos & Önder (1983) , Péricart & Golub (1996) ,
Önder et al . (2006)
, this study.

Comments: This Holomediterranean species has been found for first time from Asia Minor (= Anatolia ) by Horváth (1883) as
Monanthia echii
from Bursa .
